constraints.constraint: self.referenceName.size()>0 This will check if a reference's name is correct Reference name not valid
self.referenceDefinition<>null This will check that a template sub component has a reference A template sub component needs a reference
self.referenceDefinition<>null This will check if a sub component has a reference A subcomponent needs to reference a component
self.referenceDefinition<>null This will check if a sub component has a reference A subcomponent needs to reference a component
self.reference <> null This will check that a template specifier has a reference A template needs a reference
self.name.size()>0 This will check if a component's name is correct Component name not valid
self.name.size() > 0 This will check that all interfaces have a name Interface must have a name

let s : String = self.codeC in ( s.size() > 3 ) and ( s.substring(1,2) = '{{' ) and ( s.substring(s.size()-1,s.size()) = '}}' ) This will check that an inline c code begins and ends with double curly brackets Inline code must begin and end with double curly brackets
(self.fileC=null or self.inlineCcode=null) This will check that datas only has one content Data must be File or Inline
not(self.fileC=null and self.inlineCcode=null) This will check that an implementation is not empty Source must not be empty
(self.fileC=null or self.inlineCcode=null) This will check that sources only has one content Source must be File or Inline
( ArchitectureDefinition.allInstances()->size() > 0) This will check that the adl is not empty There must be at least one element
